mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.qc_inspection_record_sid, t.qc_inspection_record_code, t.product_season_sid, t.product_season_code, t.material_sid, t.material_code, t.color_name, t.inspection_stage, t.result, t.inspection_method, t.inspection_partner_type, t.inspection_batch, t.quantity, t.paichan_batch, t.repeat_inspection_num, t.bhg_quantity, t.inspector, t.inspection_date, t.inspection_remark, t.plant_sid, t.plant_code, t.vendor_sid, t.vendor_code, t.defect_type, t.defect_description, t.resolve_status, t.solution_remark, t.picture_path, t.video_path, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, t5.material_name, t6.plant_name, t6.short_name as plant_short_name, t7.product_season_name from s_qua_qc_inspection_record t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name AND t.client_id = t2.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t.updater_account = t3.user_name AND t.client_id = t3.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t.confirmer_account = t4.user_name AND t.client_id = t3.client_id LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t5 ON t.material_sid = t5.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant t6 ON t.plant_sid = t6.plant_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t7 ON t.product_season_sid = t7.product_season_sid
mapper.insert:
insert into s_qua_qc_inspection_record
client_id, qc_inspection_record_sid, qc_inspection_record_code, product_season_sid, product_season_code, material_sid, material_code, color_name, inspection_stage, result, inspection_method, inspection_partner_type, inspection_batch, quantity, paichan_batch, repeat_inspection_num, bhg_quantity, inspector, inspection_date, inspection_remark, plant_sid, plant_code, vendor_sid, vendor_code, defect_type, defect_description, resolve_status, solution_remark, picture_path, video_path, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.qcInspectionRecordSid}, #{item.qcInspectionRecordCode}, #{item.productSeasonSid}, #{item.productSeasonCode}, #{item.materialSid}, #{item.materialCode}, #{item.colorName}, #{item.inspectionStage}, #{item.result}, #{item.inspectionMethod}, #{item.inspectionPartnerType}, #{item.inspectionBatch}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.paichanBatch}, #{item.repeatInspectionNum}, #{item.bhgQuantity}, #{item.inspector}, #{item.inspectionDate}, #{item.inspectionRemark}, #{item.plantSid}, #{item.plantCode}, #{item.vendorSid}, #{item.vendorCode}, #{item.defectType}, #{item.defectDescription}, #{item.resolveStatus}, #{item.solutionRemark}, #{item.picturePath}, #{item.videoPath}, #{item.remark}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
